Key Match Events: The Royals evened up their ALDS series against the Yankees 4-2
Pre-Game Insights: Patrick Mahomes joked that he and his wife Brittany could 'feud' if he went to the Royals game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Patrick Mahomes attended the Royals-Yankees game despite claiming it could cause a 'feud' with his wife Brittany
Others: Patrick Mahomes and his brother Jackson were seen at the Royals-Yankees game on Wednesday
The series is tied at one game apiece
